'''La Lettre a Focalors''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for La Lettre a Focalors is obtained from [[Arouet]] at [[Café Lutece]] for {{Item|Mora|x=5,000}}.

Depending on the quality, La Lettre a Focalors increases all party members' Max [[HP]] by '''20'''/'''22'''/'''25'''% for 300s. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Furina|"Pour la Justice"}}
